name: PRO COP - EXTERMINATION
description:
-DESCRIPTION-

Robots have taken control over the world! You have to demolish them

You are the last policeman in the city.

They will come in huge but you have to stay strong and kill them!

Hope that it will become better, 

YOU HAVE TO BE A PRO COP

-SUPPORT <3-

If you liked this game then drop a review

that will mean the world to us,

share this game with you family and friends.

Thank you and enjoy <3
